Name: nya-alhajiyusufmuha
Author: Al Haji Yusuf Muhammad Kanyamula
Source: http://goodwordbooks.com/, Goodword Books, Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africa

Translations.Text: Kupatula okhawo amene amakhulupirira ndi kuchita ntchito zabwino ndipo amalimbikitsana wina ndi mzake kuchita chilungamo ndi kukumbutsana kupirira
